examples: I lifted the lid of the box and peered in.
Levanté la tapa de la caja y miré dentro.
She lifted her head to look at him.
Ella levantó la cabeza para mirarlo.
He lifted the toddler up and cuddled her.
Levantó a la niña y la abrazó.
He stood there with his arms lifted above his head.
Se quedó allí con los brazos levantados por encima de la cabeza.
